official_title: To amend the provisions of chapter 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, which relate to the deposit required in the case of an election to provide a survivor annuity to a spouse by a post retirement marriage or a former spouse.

summary.text: Revises Federal law regarding the Civil Service Retirement System and Federal Employees' Retirement System with respect to the deposit required in the case of an election to provide a survivor annuity to a spouse by a post-retirement marriage or to a former spouse.

titles.title: To amend the provisions of chapter 83 and 84 of title 5, United States Code, which relate to the deposit required in the case of an election to provide a survivor annuity to a spouse by a post retirement marriage or a former spouse.
